criteria: Ability to express exponential models as logarithms.
Ability to evaluate logarithms using technology.
Understanding of the relationship between exponential and logarithmic forms.
descriptions: Student cannot express the exponential model as a logarithm.
Student struggles to express the exponential model as a logarithm with significant errors.
Student can express the exponential model as a logarithm with some errors.
Student can correctly express the exponential model as a logarithm, but the solution is not simplified.
Student can correctly express the exponential model as a logarithm and simplify the solution.

Student can correctly and efficiently express exponential models as logarithms, simplifying the solution and demonstrating a thorough understanding of the relationship between exponential and logarithmic forms.
Student cannot use technology to evaluate the logarithm.
Student attempts to use technology but is unsuccessful in evaluating the logarithm.
Student can use technology to evaluate the logarithm but makes errors in input or interpretation.
Student can correctly use technology to evaluate the logarithm, but the answer is not precise.
Student can correctly use technology to evaluate the logarithm and provide a precise answer.
Student demonstrates proficiency in using technology to evaluate logarithms, providing precise answers and explaining the process clearly.
Student shows no understanding of the relationship between exponential and logarithmic forms.
Student shows limited understanding of the relationship between exponential and logarithmic forms.
Student shows some understanding of the relationship between exponential and logarithmic forms, but struggles to apply it.
Student understands the relationship between exponential and logarithmic forms and can apply it in simple cases.
Student understands the relationship between exponential and logarithmic forms and can apply it in most cases.
Student demonstrates a thorough understanding of the relationship between exponential and logarithmic forms and can apply it in complex problem-solving scenarios.
